page.title: 17Farming.
page.content: Of course the town of Whitchurch is the main feature of this block but the area surrounding the town is also important.There are no villages to be found in the area,there are only isolated houses or farms. The farms tend to be mixed farms, that is to say they undertake a mixture of arable and livestock farming. The nature of the farming has changed in recent years,before it was mainly sheep that were reared in this part of Hampshire but the farms around Whitchurch have tended to veer away from this type of farming to the more diverse method.
